articles.title: He’s accused of executing a man behind a Hyannis bar. Now he’s out on bail, raising questions on Cape Cod.
articles.description:
Right around closing time outside a Hyannis bar last March, Alex Greene allegedly held a gun to Tony Johnson’s face and pulled the trigger. The single gunshot, fired so close that police say some of Johnson’s blood ended up inside the barrel of the gun, killed him. Cape Cod authorities quickly charged Greene with first-degree […]
